name: Legend of Green Ronin
description:
This game was created under 48 hours for the mini jam Frog edition.

It features an old-school 8 bit aesthetic where you are a tiny frog samurai who is tasked with saving the world. 

The limitation for this jam was "only one level" in which we created one overworld for the player to explore.

ALL ASSETS AND ART AND SOURCE CODE WERE CREATED IN 48 OURS FOR THE JAM. 

WARNING: Game May contain lost of Bugs and Glitches and is not properly optimized 

coding and game design by Karlo Kablar

Art design by Mitchel Krause

Sound by Avery Taylor. 

Controls:

WASD  or Arrow Keys: to Move

Q or left mouse to attack

Space Bar to Roll 

Objective;

Find all Three Statues and Activate them by touching them.
